page_content:
Report Scheduler

Version:MissionOS_2.0

Report Scheduler has the capability to schedule different types of reports, so that the reports are automatically generated and saved into particular archived folders or sent as emails.

To access the Report Scheduler functionality, follow the steps below:

  1. Log into the MissionOS application with Username and Password.
  2. In the front portal, open the Data Manager.
  3. Navigate to Admin > Reporting > click Report Scheduler
    Refer to the figure below:

 

 

  1. In the Report Scheduler, click Add New Schedule.
    The Report Scheduler opens.
  2. In the Scheduler, enter the following details required:
    1. Select the Report Type.
    2. Select the date range – Start on and Ends on.
    3. Select Recurring period.
    4. Enter the frequency of reporting.
    5. Select the project from dropdown.
    6. Select the checkboxes based on requirements:
      • Email
      • Archive
    7. Select the folder to archive from Choose Folder.

 

  1.  
  1.  

 

 

  1. Click Save to save the information.

 

Recurring Period:

The Recurring Period functionality in Report Scheduler can be set in multiple ways based on your choice:

Recurring Period can be set as Daily which results in the report getting scheduled for daily generation.

 

 

 

 

To watch the Web User Manual video on How to use Report Scheduler for daily generation, simply click on the thumbnail or link below:

 

When Recurring Period is Weekly, you can set the day of the week every nth week.

 

 

 

To watch the Web User Manual video on How to use Report Scheduler for weekly generation, simply click on the thumbnail or link below:

 

 

When Recurring Period is Monthly, you can set the recurring with the use of two options, every nth month. One option is Each where you can select the day of a month from 1-31 days.

 

 

For the second option as On the you can select First – Fifth of Sunday – Saturday.

 

 

To watch the Web User Manual video on How to use Report Scheduler for monthly generation, simply click on the thumbnail or link below:

 

 

When the Recurring Period is Yearly, you can set the recurring every nth year along with the selection of the month and day (1-31) on which the report generation has to recur.

 

 

 

To watch the Web User Manual video on How to use Report Scheduler for yearly generation, simply click on the thumbnail or link below:

 

Select Recurring Period as Don’t Recur so that there is no repetition in report generation and it occurs only once.

 

 

 

To watch the Web User Manual video on How to use Report Scheduler for onetime generation, simply click on the thumbnail or link below:
